wikipedia_page.main: General Charles Stuart (1810–1892) was a British politician and an officer in the British Army.

response: *Charles Stuart (British Army officer, born 1753) (1753–1801), British Army lieutenant general
*Charles Stuart (British Army officer, born 1810) (1810–1892), British Army general
*Charles Stuart (East India Company officer) (c. 1758–1828), East India Company major general
